Posts.Content: knotguilty69 wrote: Can anyone help me to understand......my wonderful, beautiful, loving mother has been fighting breast cancer now for 2 years...July 06, she was diagnosed with cancer and they removed her left breast...39+ chemo treatments..including the "red dragon" and 46+ radiation treatments later they tell us she's in remission...(July 07)  Whew!!! so we thought...Jan. 16-08,  it has spred to her liver, lungs,and sternum...We start aggressive treatment.....Her hair falls out again after 1st treatment....Feb.01-08 it's now in her right breast and growing.....I'm stumped, numb, never felt  so helpless in my life...Help me,,,please understand   Her diagnosis; invasive ductal carcinoma Log in to post a reply
